job.title: Software Engineer
job.description: ltpgtWe are excited to announce that we are looking for a second Software Engineer to join our team Hank Hank aims to build the largest retirement home network by bringing all the amenities of an independent living home into our aging loved ones homes Weve raised close to 7M from top investors and are looking for an experienced engineer to join and help us build an excellent team and productltpgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtAbout youltpgtltulgtltligthave 4 years of experience building modern web apps in a production settingltligtltligthave proficiency with React and the surrounding ecosystemltligtltligtare comfortable iterating on backend applications with relational databasesltligtltligtare excited to collaborate with nonengineer teammates to envision features and solutionsltligtltligtare empathetic towards the needs of users who may be dissimilar from themselvesltligtltligtare comfortable working independently to design build and ship featuresltligtltligtwill be motivated to learn and share ownership of our full tech stackltligtltulgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtInterested Find out more here httpsangelcocompanygethankjobs1431025softwareengineerltpgt
